channel.title: Help With Safe Zones
channel.description: Ok I have a Vorrock Train place with the Dummys and Stuff i need Help bcuz some parts of my dummy zone are not safe and ppl pk there all the time Also how do you spawn objects not by setobject but forever into the server? thx for help.

item.title: Help With Safe Zones
item.dc:creator: @n0vamage n0vamage
item.description:
@n0vamage wrote:

to make safe zones you wanna get the coords going from south west to north east like this for example

||(absX >=3250  && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419  && absY <=3423 )||

the first x and the first Y will be at the south west cornor of the area you want to make safe and the second will be at the north east cornor of it then you want to save compile and run and it will be a safe zone =] if you get any errors tell me and ill work on fixing them

Read full topic

item.title: Help With Safe Zones
item.dc:creator: @robocz033 robocz033
item.description:
@robocz033 wrote:

ok, first off, the training place is the building right? and second just do ::object (“objectid”)
replace objectid with the object you wanna spawn.
if it is in the building, i use this safezone, its basically just around the building, so noobs dont get pked right away:

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 2668 && absX <= 2683 && absY >= 3414 && absY <= 3429) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )||(absX >=3222 && absX <=3264 && absY >=3396 && absY <=3454 )|| (absX >= 2903 && absX <= 2931 && absY >= 3462 && absY <= 3464) || (absX >= 2728 && absX <= 3462 && absY >= 2745 && absY <= 3476) || (absX >= 2438 && absX <= 3082 && absY >= 2445 && absY <= 3098) || heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }
to put that in search this

public boolean nonWild() {

and replace everything form that to this:

return false; } with the safe zone stuff i provided. honestly this is the best because most ppl want pk in varrok, but people complain because they get pked go to and from the bank so it benefits both people. =)

Read full topic
